nschat.routing

Class ForwardingTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • nschat.routing.ForwardingTable

  • public class ForwardingTable
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ForwardingTable(BasicRoutingProtocol brp, int myAddress) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearLinkedSenders()
      Clears the list of linked senders.
      void clearUnseenRoutes()
      Sets all route costs to -1 if the link to the node is broken.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getDestinations()
      Returns the list of destinations, with the cost unequal to -1.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getLinkedSenders()
      Returns the list of the linked senders.
      java.util.Collection<BasicRoute> getRoutes()
      Returns all BasicRoutes in the forwardingTable.
      void removeRoute(java.lang.Integer destination)
      Removes the BasicRoute corresponding to the given destination from the forwardingTable.
      void setCost()
      Increases the cost of a destination in the forwardingTable if not heard from in a long time, if the cost goes above a certain amount, the cost is set to -1.
      void updateTable(java.util.List<BasicRoute> routes, int routesSender)
      Updates the forwardingTable with the given BasicRoutes, and adds the forwardingTable to the sendingBuffer.
      void updateUnlinkedDests()
      Update the unlinkedDests list, lowering each destination's unlink_cooldown with 1, and removing it from the list if its unlink_cooldown is 0.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • ForwardingTable

        public ForwardingTable(BasicRoutingProtocol brp,
                       int myAddress)

    • Method Detail

      • updateUnlinkedDests

        public void updateUnlinkedDests()
        Update the unlinkedDests list, lowering each destination's unlink_cooldown with 1, and removing it from the list if its unlink_cooldown is 0.

      • clearUnseenRoutes

        public void clearUnseenRoutes()
        Sets all route costs to -1 if the link to the node is broken.

      • removeRoute

        public void removeRoute(java.lang.Integer destination)
        Removes the BasicRoute corresponding to the given destination from the forwardingTable.
        Parameters:
        destination - The destination of which the corresponding BasicRoute will be deleted

      • getDestinations

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> getDestinations()
        Returns the list of destinations, with the cost unequal to -1.

      • getRoutes

        public java.util.Collection<BasicRoute> getRoutes()
        Returns all BasicRoutes in the forwardingTable.

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable(java.util.List<BasicRoute> routes,
                        int routesSender)
        Updates the forwardingTable with the given BasicRoutes, and adds the forwardingTable to the sendingBuffer.
        Parameters:
        routes - BasicRoutes which will be used to update the forwardingTable
        routesSender - The sender of the BasicRoute

      • setCost

        public void setCost()
        Increases the cost of a destination in the forwardingTable if not heard from in a long time, if the cost goes above a certain amount, the cost is set to -1.

      • getLinkedSenders

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getLinkedSenders()
        Returns the list of the linked senders.

      • clearLinkedSenders

        public void clearLinkedSenders()
        Clears the list of linked senders.
